Key Match Events: Michael Leask hit a no-hitter with 35 runs and took 1 wicket
Gerhard Erasmus scored 52 runs but was dismissed by Michael Leask
Zane Green scored 28 runs with a strike rate of 103.70
Namibia lost 9 wickets for 155 runs in 20 overs
Scotland won by 5 wickets with 9 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Michael Leask was named Man of the Match
Namibia's Gerhard Erasmus scored 130.36 points according to Cricscore's MVP
Miscellaneous Highlights: Namibia batted first after winning the toss
Scotland won the match with 5 wickets to spare
The match was played at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados
